message.text: In this task you will help replace the battery of beacons so blind people can always navigate through CMU. Wooo!

Your task will be to give life to old beacons!
Please go to the location on the map to help replace the battery of beacon .
Once there if you find the beacon take it down and open it (see nifty image below!).
Measure the voltage of the battery by placing the battery in between the multimeter's probes.
If the battery level is below 2.8 volts or no battery is found place a new battery. If no beacon is found, help rescue it by sending me the message of "Missing".
